Oba hari eth me wage awasthawaka obatumiyata unath awegayak ati wenawa eka madavi kamak Wath chandi kamakwat newei.. Ara ganu kenata wenama vishesha salakillak unu nisai me kollo hari unat waradi unath e welawe policyta erehiwa katha kale.. Kollot waradi tamai eh me mohote ownta waradak kiyanna baha..
